channel.title: Works On Localhost but Not Ip?
channel.description:
Hey.. i'm using a 562 called "Runeslay" or otherwise known in the download section as "Awesome 562, real soul wars, etc etc"
Okay so when I put in client.java client sided 127.0.0.1 I can login and stuff (didn't change anything in source) but when I put k-scape.hopto.org in client.java it wont connect to update server? It's really about to annoy me, and my members have been waiting on me for 2 hours to get it online :S please help!!! I'm desperate :'(

item.title: Works On Localhost but Not Ip?
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Okay well listen, when I made my 317 online, it worked, now I want my 526 online, I have waited long enough, I have got enough practice, this is just 1 roadblock. I just don’t know what files to edit for sure.

Read full topic
item.source: Works On Localhost but Not Ip?

item.title: Works On Localhost but Not Ip?
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

go into windows firewall and click “add port” and put 43594 or w/e port you are using into it and just name them like rsps 1 and 2, it doesnt matter. do one TCP and other UDP or w/e. BTW, my comment IS the reason YOU cant connect using ur alternate ip, there are other factors holding your members from joining. probablt port forwarding, make sure u also got setting on ur router settings webpage thing.

Read full topic

throws hot cookies in rangadanger7 eye sockets

What files do I have to edit in cilent and source with my IP?

item.source: Works On Localhost but Not Ip?

item.title: Works On Localhost but Not Ip?
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

back on matter…
yes make sure you changed the right files in client and uploiad for you members…
make sure you have portforwarded correctly…
make sure you have no-ip running…
make sure you have your firewall off … or atleadt added the port into thier too

and your good to go

Read full topic
